title: Soshite Fumetsu no Regunare - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Artifacts   Battle Competition   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Love Triangles   Male Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Roommates   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World
author: Masaki Masamune
description:
High school student, Kisaragi Takeru who had gained special physical abilities from the accident of his past, lives in a modern society without changing much though uncomfortable.

However one day, a mysterious light engulfed the warehouse in his house, and the next thing he knew, he’s in a world where “swords” which is used to amplify magic ruled the world.

And a beautiful girl with a black hair and black eyes named herself as Sakuya.

“Floating on the altitude above 15,000 meters, the world’s only floating city―――Shinrei Fuyuu Toshi(Ether Float)”

Elites from different nations gathered in one school 『Fuuken Gakuen (Sealed Sword Academy)』 a school where the stage for peerless fantasy battles are unfold, Shidou!(Initiate!)>
